## Resources.ResourceCandidate.canMatchPartialContext() method

Determines if this candidate can match the supplied context (possibly partial).

**Signature:**

```typescript
canMatchPartialContext(context: Context.IValidatedContextDecl, options?: Context.IContextMatchOptions): boolean;
```

</td></tr>

</td><td>

[Context.IContextMatchOptions](./ts-res.context.icontextmatchoptions.md)


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Options to use when matching.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

boolean

`true` if the candidate can match the context, `false` otherwise.
